item.title: One of the New Feature of ggplot2 3.0
item.description: Why this post? Some time ago Dina Pomeranz posted on twitter a brief article about how the gender gaps has been falling in most countries, if you dont believe me: The unadjusted gender wage gap for full time workers has been falling significantly in most countries: https://t.co/k7olIo40ZA pic.twitter.com/uknetWXajw — Dina D. Pomeranz (@DinaPomeranz) July 4, 2018 After reading the post1, I decided to replicate the entire article using the new features of ggplot2 3.
